definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]

sentences.english: Place a lock on that object and enclose your code inside that lock.
sentences.chinese: 將鎖定置於物件上並將您的程式碼封入鎖定內。

sentences.english: We are an authentication thing because we do not know probably and have done the inclosure again.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們大概不知道和未再做封入物，我們是認證事。

definition: variant of 凝練|凝练[ning2 lian4]
many things arranged together, or connected together/to go on limitlessly
the Yellow Springs/the underworld of Chinese mythology/the equivalent of Hades or Hell
to shed skin/to leave one's mortal envelope/remains (of a priest)
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
